message: I propose a fair, but slightly skewed, split. I'll take 90% and you can have 10%.  Let's get this game started!
I'm proposing a more equitable split. Let's be fair to each other and get this done!
I think your proposal was a good start, Bob. Let's meet in the middle. I'll take 5500, and you can have 4500. We're both getting a better deal than in the previous round.
